dc_title_s: Regional Transit Districts and Local Centers: Prince George's County, Maryland, Plan 2035
dc_description_s: This layers shows the boundaries of the Regional Transit Districts and Local Centers (Local Transit, Neighborhood, Campus and Town) established through the approval Plan Prince George’s 2035, per CR-26-2014. The center boundaries follow property lines or lie within a ½ mile radius from its center point. Future amendments to center boundaries may occur through master plan updates.Center boundaries follow property lines, zoning boundaries, TDO and DDO boundaries.Boundaries may currently be designated as a polygon, an intersection (such as Langley Park) a Metro station (such as Southern Avenue) or a MARC station (such as Seabrook).Centers may be changed through a General Plan amendment (such as through the approval of a new master or sector plan). Local Transit Center areas are primarily based upon future development of Purple Line Stations.
dc_creator_sm: The Maryland-National Capital Park & Planning Commission - Prince George's County
